name: Reimagined Non-canon(Demo)
description:
"Finally... after those years... You can finally look at that peace of cringe... I hope you'll enjoy it, bro..."

This story is inspired on original game "Sonic.exe: The Spirits Of Hell" by Danuha(sowwy if I wrote his nickname wrong). You don't have to download this game, but if you want to download that, then...   Then do it, sis-bro.

WARNING!

This cringe VN has voilence, gore, strong language, blood, terrifying moments, jumpscares, non-original soundtracks, characters and plagiat moments.

Characters

Sakuri - from Demonophobia

Moge-Ko - from Mogeko Castle

Zerrath - from Reimagined

Original Characters

AnasiUnika(AU) - my OC

Remio-san

More info you can find in "READ ME" file.
